text: N’Abayahudi bama bavuga bati:- Abakirisu ntaco bafise namba, n’Abakirisu nabo bakavuga bati:- Abayahudi ntaco bafise namba, mugihe bose basoma igitabu c’Imana y’ukuri, uku rero niko bamwe ataco bazi bavuga, ni nk’akarorero k’imvugo yabo, rero Imana izobacira urubanza ruzoba hagati yabo k’umusi w’imperuka kuvyo bamye batumvikana ko
